sermons.title: A Call To Prayer
sermons.description: As the title suggests Michael Brown gives an earnest call to prayer which inspires zeal and identifies godly character with a life of prayer. There is a needed renewed call for prayer in our day.

sermons.title: Confronting the Homosexual Agenda
sermons.description: Dr. Brown gives a strong encouragement to be light and salt in the world, revolutionizing society and impacting the nature of our culture. He gives frightening facts about the progressing homosexual revolution, including its aims and successes while maintaining a compassionate heart for their lives.

sermons.title: Hold Not Thy Peace, O God of My Praise
sermons.description: This is a stirring sermon to encourage us in the midst of a storm. From the Psalms and Hebrews Pastor Conlon shows us that the truth of God in our hearts will bring peace amidst the lying and hating voices around us. A wonderful exhortation against the attacks of the enemy.
